main event: An unidentified object was observed in the sky over Brookville, Ohio on May 6, 1965.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 5 minutes., The object was described as a small light much brighter than surrounding stars., The object disappeared suddenly during the observation., The sky was clear with full moonlight at the time of the sighting., No physical evidence or photographs were noted in the report.
sighted object: a small bright light in the sky
